short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enriches the DBLP website with information about the footprint produced by conferences.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
grnDBLP extends DBLP's website with information about the carbon footprint generated by conferences. It is aimed at making the computer science community aware of the environmental impact behind conferences. To do so, it arranges in a map the flights taken by the authors of all the articles in a conference.

grnDBLP relies on third party services to obtain the data needed to calculate the footprint: 
- Scopus (authors affiliation)
- Geocode.xyz, here and locationiq (geocoding)

The extension is currently under development, so we appreciate your feedback.

Privacy policy: http://onekin.org/portal/content/privacy-policy
